trans-unit.target: 表示提供程序相关的异常。

trans-unit.source: Note: the WMI .NET libraries are now considered in final state, and no further development, enhancements, or updates will be available for non-security related issues affecting these libraries.
trans-unit.target: 注意︰ WMI.NET 库都被视为在最终状态，不进一步开发、 增强功能，或更新将可供影响这些库的非安全相关问题。

trans-unit.source: The [MI APIs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) should be used for all new development.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Management.Instrumentation.InstrumentationException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new <xref href="System.Management.Instrumentation.InstrumentationException"></xref> class with the System.Exception that caused the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化新<xref href="System.Management.Instrumentation.InstrumentationException"></xref>类 System.Exception 引发当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: The Exception instance that caused the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Management.Instrumentation.InstrumentationException"></xref> class with a message that describes the exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Management.Instrumentation.InstrumentationException"></xref>类使用的描述异常的消息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Management.Instrumentation.InstrumentationException"></xref> class with serialization information.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Management.Instrumentation.InstrumentationException"></xref>用序列化信息的类。

trans-unit.source: The data that is required to serialize or deserialize an object.
trans-unit.target: 需序列化或反序列化对象数据。

trans-unit.source: Description of the source and destination of the specified serialized stream.
trans-unit.target: 源和目标的指定的序列化流的说明。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <xref href="System.Management.Instrumentation.InstrumentationException"></xref> class with the specified string and exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化新<xref href="System.Management.Instrumentation.InstrumentationException"></xref>使用指定的字符串和异常类。

trans-unit.source: The Exception instance that caused the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常实例。
